subtitle: The inaugural issue of the New Thinking Allowed magazine

Thinking Allowed, conversations on the leading

Hello and welcome.

Hello and welcome.

In a couple of days, this Sunday, April 2nd,

So, today what I thought I would do is share
with you what are some of the toughest questions

It's really very relevant because I'm in the

That's the question I'm still trying to resolve.
For those of you who follow these In Presence

last December 28th, is when I first announced it.
Now, today is March 27th, so we're 89 days out

It's nearly complete.
I'm still scratching my head, trying to

Let me be very clear, if you watched that

should have statistically significant warmer

This was all a fantasy.
It didn't happen.
Now, I have yet to analyze the weather data.
I don't know for sure, but I suspect that while it was indeed warmer in Ukraine over

to the average temperatures in that country
over the previous 5 years for this 90 day period, basically January, February, March.
I don't think that the final result will be statistically significant.
To make matters worse, I've discovered it's a lot harder to do a statistical evaluation

because the weather is inter-correlated with
itself by time and by space.
Even though I can put together probably over a

at the end of the day, I'll probably say the
average temperature was 3 degrees warmer.
If we compare that historically with the average temperatures in Ukraine from summer

That's my best guess at this point without having run the numbers.

So, not having done the analysis, I am pretty

Should I say then, bottom line, that the exercise
was a failure, that the PK man, Ted Owens,
has not really communicated to me, the whole thing was an illusion?
I think I'm dancing on the head of a pin because, on the one hand, yes, absolutely.
From my perspective today, on the 27th of March, the experiment was a failure.
I have no reason to confirm that Ted Owens has actually been in communication with me.
But now, let's look at the other side of the coin.
This is why I say I'm dancing on the head of a pin.

I've had quite a bit of communication with him.

When I felt that I had done so, and it was in

half awake state, that it came to me.

So, is life after death a possibility?
Absolutely.
Was Ted Owens, when he was alive, were his psychokinetic abilities, his precognitive

Absolutely, in my experience.

acres, including a UFO appearance that was photographed.
The photograph was published on the front

this is the most important phone call you

It's up to you now.

So, I have grounds for accepting the reality

But the story goes even deeper.

And so, Miranda did agree to do this reading for me.

on my door.

The knocking I heard was in my dream.

I had another dream, a whole series of vivid dreams after I went back to sleep.
The upshot of it is I actually acted, I did something.
I took ownership of those dreams.
Without going into the details of why I did what I did, I ordered a Daruma doll.
I'm going to show a picture of this Daruma doll.
It's an example of a Japanese, you could call
it a folk practice, where you paint, when
you set a goal, you paint in one of the eyes
of the Daruma and you wait until the goal
is actualized before you paint in the other eye.
So, I did that with the idea that the actualization

So, I was hoping to actually create that.

The goal is to figure out whether Ted Owens is really there.

The fact that we didn't achieve what I thought was

It might not be real.

Let me leave you with this.
